data.title: Infor Manila - Taguig City - Produkt/Dienstleistung
data.meta_description: Infor Manila, Taguig City. Gefällt 12.004 Mal · 9 Personen sprechen darüber. Culture & Jobs Page of Infor PH. Disclaimer: We don't necessarily reflect...
data.text:
Impressum

This is the official Facebook account of Infor Philippines Solutions and Service Center (PSSC). We are holding this space for the Infor Manila community – our employees, alumni, interested applicants and IT enthusiasts to get to know more about the organization, collaborate and share ideas. (Disclaimer: The postings on this site don't necessarily represent Infor's positions, strategies or opinions.)

This is being administered by the Employee Enrichment Team, a group of representatives from different Infor Manila departments committed to delivering programs that will make employees’ (and future employees’!) work experience more satisfying, meaningful and complete by enhancing the quality of their work lives through social connectivity, strengthening of positive values and culture and by giving opportunities for professional development.

We welcome your likes, comments and shares as well as your questions and suggestions regarding our posts. However, we would like to request you to please keep the content relevant and constructive as no spam, obscene, derogatory or unrelated solicitations will be allowed. We will be forced to remove users who do not comply. True to our value of integrity and professionalism, we trust that you would exercise personal responsibility and accountability in using this page.

Some quick facts about Infor Manila

Main Activity / Business: Enterprise Resource Planning Development, Support and Consulting

Formerly Lawson Software until its acquisition by Infor Global Solutions in June 2011

Operations in Manila started on January 3, 2006

Office are located in Taguig City (5th Avenue Bonifacio Global City - The Fort)

Infor Corporate Headquarters is located in New York, USA

For more information, please visit www.infor.com

For career inquiries, you may visit www.infor.com/careers
